dataset.description: Prospective Payment System (PPS)-Exempt Cancer Hospital Quality Reporting (PCHQR) Program currently uses one clinical effectiveness measureâ€”External Beam Radiotherapy (EBRT) for Bone Metastases. The resulting PPS-Exempt Cancer Hospital Quality Reporting (PCHQR) Program measures allow consumers to compare the quality of care given at the eleven PPS-exempt cancer hospitals currently participating in the program.
dataset.title: Prospective Payment System (PPS)-Exempt Cancer Hospital Quality Reporting (PCHQR)
